AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: Interaction Extension UI Model Field Manager Config Field Add Data Form
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: Used to add a configuration item for a specific interaction subcategory to control a field in the UI Model Interaction Extension forms
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.RecordType: Interaction Extension UI Model Field Manager

SaveImplementation.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_ADD_INTERACTIONEXTENSION_UIMODELFIELDMANAGER_CONFIG ( @ID uniqueidentifier = null output, @CONTEXTID uniqueidentifier, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @UIMODELFIELDCODEID uniqueidentifier = null, @ISVISIBLE bit = 0, @ISREQUIRED bit = 0 ) as
set nocount on;
if @ID is null set @ID = newid()
if @changeAgentID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @changeAgentID output
declare @currentDate datetime set @currentDate = getdate()
begin try -- handle inserting the data insert into dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION_UIMODELFIELDMANAGER (ID, INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID, UIMODELFIELDCODEID, ISVISIBLE, ISREQUIRED, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED) values (@ID, @CONTEXTID, @UIMODELFIELDCODEID, @ISVISIBLE, @ISREQUIRED, @changeAgentID, @changeAgentID, @currentDate, @currentDate)
end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0

common:Exception.common:CustomErrorMsg: A configuration already exists for this interaction subcategory and field
